SEARCH
Package entity.domain

Class CompanyRepresentative

java.lang.Object
entity.domain.User
entity.domain.CompanyRepresentative
public class CompanyRepresentative extends User
Represents a company representative who can create internship opportunities and review student applications.

    • createOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity createOpportunity(String id, String title, String description, entity.domain.enums.InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, int slots)
      Creates a new internship opportunity in draft (PENDING) state.
      Parameters:
      id - Internship id
      title - Internship title
      description - Internship description
      level - Internship level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      preferredMajor - Preferred major (Computer Science)
      slots - Number of slots between 1 and 10 inclusive
      Returns:
      unsaved draft opportunity ready for additional data

    • listMyOpportunities

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> listMyOpportunities(OpportunityRepository oppRepo)
      Returns a list of all opportunities created under this representative's company.
      Parameters:
      oppRepo - repository used for lookup
      Returns:
      list of opportunities for this company

    • deleteOpportunity

      public boolean deleteOpportunity(String opportunityId, OpportunityRepository oppRepo)
      Deletes an opportunity if it belongs to this representative.
      Parameters:
      opportunityId - identifier of opportunity to remove
      oppRepo - repository used to perform deletion
      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeded, false otherwise.
